description: Thin beef slices and broccoli in savory soy ginger sauce, paired with steamed jasmine rice.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Beef & Broccoli Stir-Fry, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Thin beef slices and broccoli in savory soy ginger sauce, paired with steamed jasmine rice.. Scene: chinese-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: A captivating, eye-level close-up of tender, thinly sliced beef and vibrant broccoli florets, glistening in a savory soy-ginger sauce. Artfully arranged over a bed of fluffy jasmine rice in a ceramic bowl. Garnish with delicate fresh ginger slivers and a sprinkle of toasted sesame seeds. Bathed in soft, diffused natural daylight, with a shallow depth of field, capturing the gentle steam and comforting homemade essence on a subtly textured, Chinese-inspired table.
